info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 48082
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 48082
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.mailjet.com ip4:51.15.52.77/32 -all"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43280
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43280
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns.signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 51730
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 51730
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	10 mail.signaux-faibles.beta.gouv.fr.
